column4: thanks, I got my partition size which is 473876 and I am only using 20936 of it, it says.  --- system memory size: 1192MiB   --- Is this good? I dont understand how to compare the units.
df -h may produce a more helpful output
I see the results but I dont know which is swap. (someone said to another, swap should be 2x ram and I said to self, check it out)
ahh yes, that's because swap doesn't get mounted as a human readable size :) i.e. its only for machine use
